Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: MSP setup with rootCA CRLs including one of the MSP intermediate CAs should return an error
Issue.description: Currently setting up an MSP with a root CA, a bunch of intermediate CAs, and a CRL through which rootCA is blacklisting one of the listed intermediate CAs is not outputing an error of malformed MSP configuration. We should address this.
